resources.string: "File Manager attempts to use the network, it may apply other charges depending on your subscriptions."
"There is already a folder with the same name in favorite folder, do you want to rename?"
"Are you sure you want to remove \"%s\" from favorite folder?"
"Are you sure you want to remove the %d items from favorite folder?"
"ASUS File Manager allows you to easily manage your files stored in your internal, external, local area network, or cloud storages."
"Easy-to-use categories that lets you access your files in your local storage quickly. "
"Swipe an item to display the actions such as Add to Favorites, Rename, Move to, Copy to and other file managing options."
"Set a frequently-used folder as Favorite to access the folders quick and easy."
"Please perform the following steps to grant SD card access rights."
"Tap Menu icon then tap Show SD card."
"Swipe the left edge of the screen to display the drawer then tap SD card."
"Tap Select SD card to grant access to ASUS File Manager."
"If you enjoy using %s, please rate us 5-star on Play Store. It would be a great encouragement for us to continue improving the product!"
